summary: The National Institutes of Health—a leader in the support of biomedical research—faces a shortage of employees with data science expertise. NIH needs this expertise to handle the growing amount of increasingly complex data from advances in research. NIH plans to enhance its data science workforce, but it hasn't examined the skills of existing staff to determine what it needs to reach its goals. Until NIH...
title: Data Science: NIH Needs to Implement Key Workforce Planning Activities
